short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gmail add-on to help write more proffesional and polite emails using OpenAI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A magic button added to your Gmail compose window so you have the OpenAI service help you write more professional and respectable emails. Just make sure to register to OpenAI to get your API access data so you can fully utilize the extension.
